alert.note: Alert for Dixon (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 06 at 10:35PM CDT until October 07 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 AM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. * WHERE...In Iowa, Sioux County. In Nebraska, Dixon County. In South Dakota, Bon Homme, Yankton, Clay and Union Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 10 AM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
